about_the_game: El Puppster is a retro-style action platform game. Search for game cartridge to power-up and gain temporary invincibility. Checkpoint save your progress. Play the Bonus Round to earn extra lives. Relentless Enemies and Tough Bosses await you in this challenging game.
detailed_description: El Puppster is a retro-style action platform game. Search for game cartridge to power-up and gain temporary invincibility. Checkpoint save your progress. Play the Bonus Round to earn extra lives. Relentless Enemies and Tough Bosses await you in this challenging game.
legal_notice: El Puppster original characters created by Mark Baggio. All Rights Reserved.
name: el puppster Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Processor: Windows 8
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 850 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6500
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: El Puppster is a retro-style action platform game. Search for game cartridge to power-up and gain temporary invincibility. Checkpoints save your progress. Relentless Enemies and Tough Bosses await you in this challenging game.
